description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the neonatal resuscitation measures required.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Intermittent positive pressure ventilation via bag and mask
Intermittent positive pressure ventilation via endotracheal tube
Manual external cardiac massage with closed chest
